Breakfast nya enak banget, banyak pilihan menunya. Permintaan khususnya lengkap, tersedia semua, art towel sampai slice cake. Terus dapat free pisang goreng keju juga. Asli, ngga nyesel sama sekali staycation di midtown hotel surabaya.

I am connecting wifi using my laptop, it is more than 4 hours in my room, it was in 1520. Also connecting the free wifi in the lobby, never took my laptop outside hotel. Checked in on 3 aug-> using lobby wifi to connect. 3 aug & 4 aug-> connecting using midtown wifi through my room. On the 4th aug late night my network wifi can not be access (it's gone from the pin) also I can not find it through network connection through setting, I can not open google chrome, but I can open my microsoft edge, I realized it still connected to internet but I can not surf down internet. My netflix also still on, so I make some conclusion that the wifi is not safe, or my laptop has been hijacked/hacked. I do not know what's happening, directly go for airplane mode and try to restore my previous system. Thankfully I got it right, reported to the reception when I checked out on the 5th august 2023. Asking them to ask the it for take some action, hopefully it won't happening for anyone else there. Okay! Rating for other than this. Hotel lobby: only first day I got check in have the welcome drink (it was nice cold ice tea) staff: friendly and helpful.
